type:
∀ {I : Chapter11.BoundedInterval} {f g : Real → Real},
  And (Chapter9.BddOn f I.toSet) (Eq (Chapter11.lower_integral f I) (Chapter11.upper_integral f I)) →
    And (Chapter9.BddOn g I.toSet) (Eq (Chapter11.lower_integral g I) (Chapter11.upper_integral g I)) →
      I.toSet.Nonempty →
        ∀ (M₁ : Real),
          (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet x → Real.instLE.le (abs (f x)) M₁) →
            ∀ (M₂ : Real),
              (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet x → Real.instLE.le (abs (g x)) M₂) →
                Real.instLE.le 0 M₁ →
                  Real.instLE.le 0 M₂ →
                    Chapter9.BddOn (instHMul.hMul f g) I.toSet →
                      ∀ (ε : Real),
                        Real.instLT.lt 0 ε →
                          ∀ (f' : Real → Real),
                            Chapter11.MinorizesOn f' f I →
                              Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn f' I →
                                Real.instLT.lt (instHSub.hSub (Chapter11.integ f I) ε)
                                    (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ f' I) →
                                  Chapter11.MajorizesOn f' 0 I →
                                    ∀ (g' : Real → Real),
                                      Chapter11.MinorizesOn g' g I →
                                        Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn g' I →
                                          Real.instLT.lt (instHSub.hSub (Chapter11.integ g I) ε)
                                              (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ g' I) →
                                            Chapter11.MajorizesOn g' 0 I →
                                              ∀ (f'' : Real → Real),
                                                Chapter11.MajorizesOn f'' f I →
                                                  Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn f'' I →
                                                    Real.instLT.lt (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ f'' I)
                                                        (instHAdd.hAdd (Chapter11.integ f I) ε) →
                                                      Chapter11.MinorizesOn f'' (fun x => M₁) I →
                                                        ∀ (g'' : Real → Real),
                                                          Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn g'' I →
                                                            Real.instLT.lt (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ g'' I)
                                                                (instHAdd.hAdd (Chapter11.integ g I) ε) →
                                                              Chapter11.MinorizesOn g'' (fun x => M₂) I →
                                                                Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn (instHMul.hMul f' g') I →
                                                                  Chapter11.MinorizesOn (instHMul.hMul f' g')
                                                                      (instHMul.hMul f g) I →
                                                                    Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn
                                                                        (instHMul.hMul f'' g'') I →
                                                                      ∀ (x : Real),
                                                                        Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet x →
                                                                          Real.instLE.le (f x) (f'' x) →
                                                                            Real.instLE.le (g x) (g'' x) →
                                                                              Real.instLE.le 0 (g x) →
                                                                                Real.instLE.le 0 (f x) →
                                                                                  Real.instLE.le
                                                                                      (Chapter11.lower_integral
                                                                                        (instHMul.hMul f g) I)
                                                                                      (Chapter11.upper_integral
                                                                                        (instHMul.hMul f g) I) →
                                                                                    Real.instPreorder.le 0 (f'' x)
name: Chapter11

  And (Chapter9.BddOn f I.toSet) (Eq (Chapter11.lower_integral f I) (Chapter11.upper_integral f I)) →
    And (Chapter9.BddOn g I.toSet) (Eq (Chapter11.lower_integral g I) (Chapter11.upper_integral g I)) →
      Chapter11.MajorizesOn f 0 I →

            ∀ (M₁ : Real),
              (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet x → Real.instLE.le (abs (f x)) M₁) →
                ∀ (M₂ : Real),
                  (∀ (x : Real), Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet x → Real.instLE.le (abs (g x)) M₂) →
                    Real.instLE.le 0 M₁ →
                      Real.instLE.le 0 M₂ →
                        Chapter9.BddOn (instHMul.hMul f g) I.toSet →
                          Real.instLE.le 0
                              (instHSub.hSub (Chapter11.upper_integral (instHMul.hMul f g) I)
                                (Chapter11.lower_integral (instHMul.hMul f g) I)) →
                            ∀ (ε : Real),
                              Real.instLT.lt 0 ε →
                                ∀ (f' : Real → Real),
                                  Chapter11.MinorizesOn f' f I →
                                    Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn f' I →
                                      Real.instLT.lt (instHSub.hSub (Chapter11.integ f I) ε)
                                          (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ f' I) →
                                        Chapter11.MajorizesOn f' 0 I →
                                          ∀ (g' : Real → Real),
                                            Chapter11.MinorizesOn g' g I →
                                              Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn g' I →
                                                Real.instLT.lt (instHSub.hSub (Chapter11.integ g I) ε)
                                                    (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ g' I) →
                                                  Chapter11.MajorizesOn g' 0 I →
                                                    ∀ (f'' : Real → Real),
                                                      Chapter11.MajorizesOn f'' f I →
                                                        Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn f'' I →
                                                          Real.instLT.lt (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ f'' I)
                                                              (instHAdd.hAdd (Chapter11.integ f I) ε) →
                                                            Chapter11.MinorizesOn f'' (fun x => M₁) I →
                                                              ∀ (g'' : Real → Real),
                                                                Chapter11.MajorizesOn g'' g I →
                                                                  Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn g'' I →
                                                                    Real.instLT.lt
                                                                        (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ g'' I)
                                                                        (instHAdd.hAdd (Chapter11.integ g I) ε) →
                                                                      Chapter11.MinorizesOn g'' (fun x => M₂) I →
                                                                        ∀
                                                                          (hf'g'_const :
                                                                            Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn
                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f' g') I),
                                                                          Chapter11.MinorizesOn (instHMul.hMul f' g')
                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f g) I →
                                                                            ∀
                                                                              (hf''g''_const :
                                                                                Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn
                                                                                  (instHMul.hMul f'' g'') I),
                                                                              Chapter11.MajorizesOn
                                                                                  (instHMul.hMul f'' g'')
                                                                                  (instHMul.hMul f g) I →
                                                                                Real.instLE.le
                                                                                    (Chapter11.upper_integral
                                                                                      (instHMul.hMul f g) I)
                                                                                    hf''g''_const.integ' →
                                                                                  Real.instLE.le hf'g'_const.integ'
                                                                                      (Chapter11.lower_integral
                                                                                        (instHMul.hMul f g) I) →
                                                                                    Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn
                                                                                        (instHSub.hSub
                                                                                          (instHMul.hMul f'' g'')
                                                                                          (instHMul.hMul f' g'))
                                                                                        I →
                                                                                      Eq
                                                                                          (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ
                                                                                            (instHSub.hSub
                                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f'' g'')
                                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f' g'))
                                                                                            I)
                                                                                          (instHSub.hSub
                                                                                            (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ
                                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f'' g'') I)
                                                                                            (Chapter11.PiecewiseConstantOn.integ
                                                                                              (instHMul.hMul f' g')
                                                                                              I)) →
                                                                                        ∀ (x : Real),
                                                                                          Set.instMembership.mem I.toSet
                                                                                              x →
                                                                                            Real.instPreorder.le 0
                                                                                              (instHSub.hSub (g'' x)
                                                                                                (g' x))
